name: Magic Flute by Mozart
description:
** Best in Show – Gamezebo (Casual Connect, San Francisco 2015) **
** Third Award Winner – Pocket Gamer (Very Big Indie Pitch, London 2015) **

=====

"Hitting all the right notes" 9/10 – Gamezebo

"Visually the game is really impressive" 8/10 – TouchArcade

"A unique gaming experience" 8/10 – Examiner

"All of it is presented with a gorgeous look" 8/10 – Apple’N’Apps

=====

Enter the Kingdom of the Queen of the Night. Start your journey through the lands of mystery and magic as prince Tamino. Choose your steps wisely, build your path avoiding traps, deadly serpents or earth quakes. But know no fear, lose no hope and remember that you are the master of your own path.

Find the way out of 32 spatial scenes placed in a beautiful scenery of Mozart’s ‘Magic Flute’ opera. Armed only in logic, imagination and integrity help Tamino find wisdom, beauty and save the love of his life. Be careful though as in this opera-based story nothing is as it seems…

• A casual story-driven game featuring music of ‘The Magic Flute’
• Art direction inspired by the Tokyo production and set design, directed by the renowned Amon Miyamoto.
• 32 diverse, fun levels.
• 3 playable characters.
• Beautiful cutscenes.
• Multiple methods of level completion.


***DISCLAIMER: This game supports iPhone 4s / iPad 2 or later generation devices.
